## SavedObjectsClient.bulkUpdate() method

Update multiple documents at once

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  objects | <code>SavedObjectsBulkUpdateObject[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
